name: Kraken Skulls
description:
Kraken Skulls, brought to you by Cracker Jack Studios, is a vertical shooter based on the Atari's Centipede! See how long you can fight off the menacing Kraken before succumbing to it's terror. Collect power ups, rack up your score, and resist the encroaching terror from the sea. Kraken Skulls is infinitely playable, but be careful because the Kraken grows in strength as time goes on.

Kraken Skulls is guaranteed to make your bath-time way more fun!
